ai-thig6.8:1.3_0: Failing to find peace of heart,
ai-thig6.8:1.4_0: or any control over my mind.
ai-thig6.8:3.3_0: the awakening factors, and the eightfold path
ai-thig6.8:4.3_0: In the first watch of the night,
ai-thig6.8:5.1_0: In the middle watch of the night,
ai-thig6.8:5.3_0: In the last watch of the night,
ai-thig6.8:5.4_0: I shattered the mass of darkness.
ai-thig6.8:6.1_0: I then meditated pervading my body
ai-thig6.8:6.3_0: On the seventh day I stretched out my feet,
ai-thig6.8:6.4_0: having shattered the mass of darkness.
ai-thig6.8:8.1_0: The Book of the Sixes is finished.
